title: Life on Canvas
description: Come for a visit to Karsten Field with these Biblically inspired stories of home and family. Best-selling author George Michael Loughmueller goes back to Karsten Field for a new serialized novel. Almost eight years after his journey began, Allan and Mary now have two children, Benjamin and Ruth, in their Amish Home. In Volume 4 â€“Life on Canvas, recently widowed Margaret discovers a secret in her attic that brings her to Karsten Field. Margaret feels like she has lost everything with the death of her husband. Then she is faced with the need to sacrifice her last connection to him. A chance meeting with a young Amish girl named Ruth forces her to test her faith in God and leads her to making a decision where God should be in her life.
author: George Michael Loughmueller
